paragraphs.text:
%sh

echo 'create "customer_info2", "profile"' > /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt

echo "put 'customer_info2','1','profile:name','frank'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt
echo "put 'customer_info2','1','profile:location','north carolina'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt
echo "put 'customer_info2','1','profile:balance','100,000'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt

echo "put 'customer_info2','2','profile:name','dean'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt
echo "put 'customer_info2','2','profile:location','new york'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt
echo "put 'customer_info2','2','profile:balance','90,000'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt

echo "put 'customer_info2','3','profile:name','sammy'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt
echo "put 'customer_info2','3','profile:location','nevada'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt
echo "put 'customer_info2','3','profile:balance','75,000'" >> /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt

cat /tmp/create_hbase_table.txt
paragraphs.title: Script to create Hbase Table

paragraphs.title: Create a temporary directory - This is the location where the Snapshot will be temporarily restored
Create Hive Table
paragraphs.text:
%hive

CREATE TABLE if not exists hive_hbase_ss (key string, name string, location string, balance string, time timestamp) 
STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("hbase.columns.mapping" = ":key,profile:name,profile:location,profile:balance,:timestamp")
TBLPROPERTIES ("hive.hbase.snapshot.name"="customer_info2_ss");

paragraphs.title: Query the Database Snapshot in Hive (with Timestamp)
